posts.post_content:
I'm continuing to break up my set of t205s.  Here are some raw cards I never got graded.  All are clean as seen and bought 10+ years ago.  No trims at all.


Top grouping are $22 each + $4 ship - I'd grade these as VG
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/6t6yQj0/IMG-1269.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/mSBtSPT/IMG-1270.jpg[/IMG]

This grouping are $17 each + $4 ship - I'd grade these as more GD
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/tsLZ0nf/IMG-1266.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/DpFVXQw/IMG-1268.jpg[/IMG]

Only pay shipping once.  (I'll be adding more over time if I sense there is interest)

Feel free to ask questions via PM.  
Thanks
Michael
I'll take Birdwell and Sheckard, sending a PM also.

The following have SOLD

Bridwell
Sheckhard
Becker
Knight
Criger

The remainder of these have been SOLD.  Thanks.

I'll try and post more later in the week.  Those are in slightly better shape.
